Rotterdam port employs 180,000 people, 1,500 of which are in customs. They use sniffer dogs, dive teams and scanners to check cargo entering Europe. A profile based risk assessment helps them decide which of the 14 million containers that pass through each year to check. https://t.co/B6d1BfnwIa

Q: What future for WTO? 
@MalmstromEU: “We will keep pushing for progress ahead of the next ministerial in June next year. Broad reform as well as pushing forward with plurilaterals. It looks gloomy but the EU is united on this and we need to mobilise other supportive members.”

Q: Is an trade agreement with China on the horizon?
@MalmstromEU : We’re not there yet. We’re making slow but steady progress with our investment agreement. China needs to walk the talk when it comes to reforms.

tweets.text: Moderated an intense day on how to boost #WomenInTrade with @MalmstromEU and 18 other speakers including top officials @WTO @ILO @OECD @WorldBank @UNCTAD @ITC @EBRD @BusinessEurope, NGO @Concord_Europe, and local businesses like @Thokozani_SA wines! @EU_Commission @Trade_EU https://t.co/5BVUateiwP

#TradeForHer closes with smiles after a long and intense day of #hardtalk and outreach. @MalmstromEU very much the visionary mind behind it all. @Denise61782394 @Trade_EU @EUinSA https://t.co/2BtWbVgO32

This was an amazing event! 
Brilliant speakers, incredible insights and very tangible take aways.

Thank you @Trade_EU  for organizing. And thank you again @MalmstromEU and @AranchaGlezLaya  for the @TradeExperettes shout out!
#TradeForHer https://t.co/2OhMl9e5rY

Statistics are making our arguments in favour of action, so we’re training administrations on data collection and correlation aswel to measure achievements. It could appear as technical and it is, but crucial to avoid #genderwashing @UNCTAD at #TradeForHer https://t.co/FUWQscmgD9

RT @WeyandSabine: EU-#Mercosur trade agreement in a nutshell - short thread👇 https://t.co/vIPK8Qw30z

This deal = big opportunities for our farmers.  It slashes high agri tariffs, protects over 300 artisanal food and drink products like Champagne and Irish Whiskey, whilst safeguarding sensitive products through limited quotas representing a fraction of overall EU consumption.

EU standards have been protected:
- The precautionary principle is upheld
- All food that gets to our tables must pass stringent EU food safety rules - these are non-negotiable

The deal also sets high standards for the environment and workers’ rights. Our partners must abide by Paris agreement, including on emissions and deforestation. We reinforce multilateral agreements whilst others rip them up.

EU-#Mercosur deal means big opportunities for our firms and their workers. A market of almost 300m people open to us but effectively closed to our competitors. EU companies will save €4bn in taxes at the border. Trade = jobs.

tweets.text:
We are presenting today negotiating mandates for #EUtrade talks with the United States: 
📂 one on technical requirements for companies
📂 one on the elimination of tariffs for industrial goods, excluding agricultural products
More → https://t.co/r3bW1MaNbT https://t.co/SYOXvzv4iB

EU-U.S. Trade Talks: European Commission presents draft negotiating mandates 
https://t.co/eJ1AKBltTQ

"Our two proposed negotiating directives will enable us to work on removing tariffs and non-tariff barriers to transatlantic trade in industrial goods, key goals of the July Joint Statement." @MalmstromEU on #EUtrade talks with the United States https://t.co/iXJQRKv1pR

Así se defiende la Unión. Bravo por @MalmstromEU Soberanía europea adoptando medidas rápidas para proteger la producción comunitaria de las importaciones masivas de arroz birmano. Esta vez “no se nos ha pasado el arroz” @ramontremosa @Sebastia_Jordi https://t.co/Xv4bDFAZRc

#EPlenary will debate from 3pm w/ @MalmstromEU ways to better protect EU rice producers from downward pressure on rice prices following massive inflow of indica rice from Cambodia and Myanmar. Oral question: https://t.co/Du2sNo2wFP Live: https://t.co/Jk802oRCm6

För den som vill lära sig mer om olika EU-frågor har nu Europaparlamentet släppt Citizen's App. Hitta projekt som fått finansiering från EU, event i närheten och läs mer om vilka förslag som läggs och deras status. Finns i Google Play och App Store.   https://t.co/oDd3S26CJu
EU-kommissionär @MalmstromEU har också svarat på vår fråga om hur beslut i EU påverkar Göteborg #eupol #gbgpol  https://t.co/3tcW0Ng44i
Steel safeguards - @EU_Commission welcomes Member States' support on definitive measures on imports of  steel https://t.co/bMFRFqdVT7

Thankful for large support for my report on the safeguard regulation today. They're a tool to liberalise trade in FTAs while keeping options open for worst-case scenarios. 

With this and the #Japan agreement done, let's approve our great FTA's with #Singapore and #Vietnam.

The #EU-#Japan Economic Partnership Agreement, the largest in the world in terms of share of trade (around 37% & 44% of global trade in goods & services), was notified to the WTO on 14 Jan and is expected to enter into force on 1 Feb 2019. More: https://t.co/bZApuy0ccn #WTORTAs https://t.co/2SKcOtirjd

.@MichelBarnier "Nous regrettons ce vote, car nous avons construit cet accord ensemble avec le gouvernement britannique.

Nous avons développé ensemble le cadre d'une relation future aussi proche & ambitieuse que les lignes rouges britanniques le permettront" #Brexit https://t.co/kBuJLzDWCc
Förbereda företaget för #Brexit? Här är listan på frågor som @Kommerskoll tagit fram för företag som vill göra sin riskanalys: https://t.co/JDmWx56QRW https://t.co/4VnR0kcvqL
If a deal is impossible, and no one wants no deal, then who will finally have the courage to say what the only positive solution is?

I take note with regret of the outcome of the vote in the @HouseofCommons this evening. I urge the #UK to clarify its intentions as soon as possible. Time is almost up #Brexit 

https://t.co/SMmps5kexn
Heartbreaking: Paweł Adamowicz, who was stabbed yesterday evening, just died. Solidarity with his family, the people of Gdańsk and Poland. https://t.co/nG21BZYkvd
I found this old US stamp with a clear message - “World Peace Through World Trade”. https://t.co/ZNYRtufo0P

Very good meeting with Commissioner Malmström to discuss steel tariffs, which is very important for Belgian industry. Also discussed trade relations with US after her visit to Washington last week. Looking forward to continuing the dialogue with the @EU_Commission. https://t.co/IwOqLwOmys
Saudi teen greeted by Canada’s foreign minister in Toronto https://t.co/ucCZxPnh7v

“Advancing a Positive Transatlantic and Multilateral Trade Agenda”: Read our @Medium story on @MalmstromEU’s visit to Washington DC this week ⤵️

#Trade2019 #EUMeansBusiness #EUTrade @Trade_EU https://t.co/V9UCQIQ51Y

It was an absolute pleasure hosting Europe's trade chief .@MalmstromEU here .@AtlanticCouncil yesterday. Thank you for an insightful discussion on #Trade2019! Missed the event? Watch it here: https://t.co/UYfUni6uZm ##EUTrade #EUmeansbusiness #womenintrade https://t.co/M2I68BiyOI

During her speech at .@AtlanticCouncil , Commissioner .@MalmstromEU stressed how #Trade is a powerful tool- economically but also geostrategically. A true win-win. #Trade2019 #EUtrade #Strongerwithallies #EUmeansbusiness Missed the event? Watch it here: https://t.co/UYfUni6uZm https://t.co/pIjZK0Wzzd
.@MalmstromEU @AtlanticCouncil: Open trade is a fundamental economic freedom. Removing that freedom is removing a critical part of open democracy. #Trade2019 https://t.co/v5Viz1dEJd

.@MalmstromEU on EU-US trade: “we’re finalizing our draft negotiating mandate on the abolition of tariffs with the US on industrial goods, which we will submit to Member States.” #Trade2019 https://t.co/JYoNlBCsIX https://t.co/yOIQBzz7Un
Today I met with European Commissioner for Trade @MalmstromEU. We discussed trade and many other critical issues. https://t.co/8Sk53v8yrg

In closing, @MalmstromEU says, “Trade is much more than money today. It’s relationships. It’s value chains. It’s people-to-people contact. It’s exchange of ideas. It can result in win-wins, not just economically, but politically & geostrategically too.” #Trade2019 7/7 https://t.co/2hfQhJgiaf

@MalmstromEU @wto On EU-US relations, @MalmstromEU says, “The US and the EU have always been partners and we want that to remain. We want to maintain the relationship, and work together to face the joint challenges that we have in the 21st century.”  #Trade2019 6/ https://t.co/5hq9pWW9Ek
@MalmstromEU "In EU-US talks our ambition is endless, but we need to be realistic." #Trade2019 https://t.co/dwHImUpwuW

@MalmstromEU The @WTO is one example. “International trade without the WTO would be anarchy,” @MalmstromEU says. “We have a plan to invigorate and revive the WTO, and we want to work with the US to do that.” #Trade2019 4/ https://t.co/FocgkkPsWs
.@MalmstromEU "We made good progress this week with @USTradeRep Lighthizer and see how we can go forward" #Trade2019 https://t.co/tSnWhBA0pe

Addressing how we should face these challenges, @MalmstromEU says: "We need to engage with globalization by building on the existing institutions...We can update them so that they are fit for this century.” #Trade2019 3/ https://t.co/umzW9X3kQ9
The pains of globalization brought with it challenges @MalmstromEU says. Speaking about Europe, she adds, “From our point of view, closing up is not the answer.” #Trade2019 2/ https://t.co/zDXsxFbeiP

.@MalmstromEU at @AtlanticCouncil: “we have moved from a period of hopeful optimism about the benefits of international economic integration to suspicion & distrust. We have transformed our trade policy to face these challenges”. Watch live: https://t.co/JYoNlBCsIX #Trade2019 https://t.co/o7BF7YyPqu

EU Trade Commissioner @MalmstromEU kicks off @AC_GBE’s trade trends 2019 event: “There’s been some significant changes in the policy area that I think you’re all here to hear about: namely international trade.” #Trade2019 1/ https://t.co/OigQZttel7

And we are off!
Amb. Boyden Gray kicks off our inaugural EuroGrowth event of 2019, with EU Trade Commissioner .@MalmstromEU https://t.co/bk4ZetnfpB

WATCH LIVE 📺at 2PM ET today (8PM CET): European Trade Commissioner @MalmstromEU will talk #Trade2019 trends at the @AtlanticCouncil @AC_GBE: https://t.co/JYoNlBCsIX

#EUTrade #EUMeansBusiness #EUintheUS https://t.co/nJjyiU8lKv

🇪🇺🚢🇯🇵Exporters - get ready to benefit from the agreement with Japan! 

The market access database now shows the lower tariffs that will apply to EU exports to Japan from 1 February, when the agreement enters into force. 
 
🔎➡️https://t.co/i6Bzy8F8pW https://t.co/KTiPQFkZSp
Many meetings on the Hill today, discussing the EU-US trade relationship. With Senators @RonWyden & @ChuckGrassley , Congressmen @RepKevinBrady and @RepRichardNeal https://t.co/JuOc9XZrvM

#ICYMI Commissioner @MalmstromEU met her US and Japanese counterparts yesterday to address global issues such as trade-distorting practices.
🇪🇺🇯🇵🇺🇸📰↘️https://t.co/tGpRiTW35e

Looking forward to an important conversation with @Trade_EU Commissioner @MalmstromEU tomorrow morning in Washington. Vital to work to strengthen ties with our largest #trade and #investment partner. 🇺🇸🇪🇺
Today's must-read: Joint Statement of the Trilateral Meeting of the Trade Ministers of the European Union, Japan and the United States. https://t.co/q4lr9urb2B

Joint Statement of the Trilateral Meeting of the Trade Ministers of the European Union, Japan and the United States ⤵️

https://t.co/ERcAUSmtOs

#EUTrade https://t.co/fDnqXVd78V

.@MalmstromEU: “we’re willing to include tariffs on all industrial goods [in trade talks with the US] but we have been clear that from the EU side we won’t discuss agriculture, like the US side won’t discuss public procurement & geographical indications”. @Trade_EU #EUTrade https://t.co/OxFfjUfYKt

.@MalmstromEU on her meeting with @USTradeRep Lighthizer yesterday: "we took stock of where we were on our Working Group. On the EU side, we're in the final preparations to finalize our draft mandates on industrial goods and conformity assessment". #EUTrade #EUMeansBusiness https://t.co/G8N3VfEZ00
.@MalmstromEU reflects on meeting w @USTradeRep Lighthizer during doorstep. Watch the video #EUmeansbusiness #EUtrade #trade2019 https://t.co/njhCcbyPpH
Doorstep @MalmstromEU this morning ahead of trilateral meeting 🇪🇺🇺🇸🇯🇵 on trade w @USTradeRep Lighthizer and Minister Seko of Japan #EUtrade #EUmeansbusiness https://t.co/UcZrxzJu2n

And learn about the trade trends for 2019 this Thursday at 2 pm, as we host EU Trade Commissioner @MalmstromEU 

👉Register: https://t.co/adyZ2vntiQ https://t.co/LdIqy2DCKk

Glad we could meet with @MalmstromEU before the end of her mandate! Great progress already thanks to her efforts (#AnimalWelfare chapter with #sentience in an #FTA) but a lot more must be done! We talked #WTO & #Sustainability, as well as more effective FTA
implementation! 😀 https://t.co/OxvcAg4UPv

We intend to impose definitive safeguard measures on imports of certain steel products.
@wto has been notified of findings in safeguard investigation. Based on these, we intend to replace provisional measures in place since July 2018. https://t.co/WK8NB7yZj2 #EUtrade https://t.co/CkFAivRflv

Great to have such fruitful meeting with @MalmstromEU, discussing #AnimalWelfare and #SDGs, effective implementation of #FTAs, #Brexit and #LiveExports! Trade hugely impacts animals and trade policy should be designed to protect our standards while promoting higher ones abroad! https://t.co/PHlMjYeqbZ

The United States is Europe's main supplier of #soya beans with imports up by 112%, latest figures reveal: https://t.co/yIx7GO83zK 📈 

This follows agreement between Presidents Juncker & Trump to increase EU-US trade in several areas & products 🇪🇺🤝🇺🇸 https://t.co/lu0nXGedG5
